website_summaries.verdict: Low, widely spaced ridges allow cats to alternate between eating directly from the bowl and "catching" food with their paws, making this option ideal for both wet or dry food.
pros: Low ridges are ideal for wet food or cats who aren't interested in fishing food out with their paws
Manages to slow greedy cats down without being discouragingly difficult to use
Ceramic construction prevents plastic-related skin and allergy issues
Smooth surface is easy to keep clean
cons: Clever or determined kitties might get food out faster than owners would like
Prone to sliding on smooth surfaces
